content.rendered:
Directed by Chris Buck. Fawn Veerasunthorn.

Written by Chris Buck. Jennifer Lee. Allison Moore.

Cast Chris Pine. Alan Tudyk. Ariana DeBose.

Language English.

Producer Peter Del Vecho. James E. Hasman. Jennifer Lee. Juan Pablo Reyes Lancaster-Jones.

Production Walt Disney Animation Studios. Walt Disney Pictures.
